english.segment1: Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Wrapped up in skin of every shade and hue
english.segment2: Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you
english.segment3: Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Wrapped up in skin of every shade and hue
english.segment4: I got my mama, my daddy, grandpa, granny. Inlaws, and outlaws, uncles and my aunties. Got my nieces, nephews, cousins out the wazoo. Got my sisters and brothers. And a handsome husband too
english.segment5: Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Wrapped up in skin of every shade and hue
english.segment6: I got my mama, my daddy, grandpa, granny. Inlaws, and outlaws, uncles and my aunties. Got my nieces, nephews, cousins out the wazoo. Got my sisters and brothers. And a pretty wife too
english.segment7: Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Got a Christmas tree full of gifts from you. Wrapped up in skin of every shade and hue.
